title: Bug 7785: SaveAs Forgets the file type
description: Bug 7785: SaveAs Forgets the file type. The icon has also changed from the parent javafile icon to a generic file icon.
OB:
1) Open an existing java file
2) Modify it (e.g. move an existing class)
3) Click the SaveAs icon, located next to the Save Icon
A dialog will appear.
4) Browse for a valid container location
5) Type the filename, but ignore the file extension, since it is not requested
6) Click Ok

Observed Behavior: The Navigator has added the file in the specified location, but no file extension is shown for the saved file.
SR:
1) Open an existing java file
2) Modify it (e.g. move an existing class)
3) Click the SaveAs icon, located next to the Save Icon
A dialog should appear.
4) Browse for a valid container location
5) Type the filename, but ignore the file extension, since it is not requested
6) Click Ok

Expected Behavior: The Navigator should add the file in the specified location with the appropriate file extension shown for the saved file.
